section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: “Attorney General” means the Attorney General for the District of Columbia.
“CMPA” means Chapter 6 of Title 1, [§ 1-601.01 et seq.].
“Department” means the Department of Health Care Finance established by § 7-771.02.
“Department CFO” means the Chief Financial Officer for the Department of Health Care Finance.
“District CFO” means the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
“PPA” means Unit A of Chapter 3 of Title 2, [§ 2-301.01 et seq.)].

annotations.annotation: Section 7090 of D.C. Law 17-219 repealed section 13 of D.C. Law 17-109.
